reasoning: TB CNS (primarily TB meningitis) represents approximately 1-3% of all TB cases. With global TB incidence around 140-160 per 100k, TB CNS incidence estimated at ~3.2 per 100k. Incidence metric appropriate for acute infectious disease. Moderate confidence due to limited disease-specific epidemiological studies; most data aggregates CNS TB within overall TB burden.
source: WHO Global Tuberculosis Report (2005-2006), citing TB surveillance data
